welcome_message_body: Welcome to Quillacollo, Bolivia! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, colorful festivals, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Quillacollo has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Chiken's Kingdon
restaurants.description: Chiken's Kingdon is a fried chicken joint located in Quillacollo.
restaurants.address: Av.  Blanco Galindo #139 (Suarez Miranda y 23 De Marzo), Quillacollo

restaurants.name: Panchita
restaurants.description: Panchita is a fried chicken joint located in Cochabamba.

restaurants.description: Brisbania Churrasqueria is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pollos kingdown
restaurants.description: Pollos kingdown is a latin american restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: La Casona Restaurant
restaurants.description: La Casona Restaurant is a bbq joint located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at J Wilsterman Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at J Wilsterman Airport provides exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
